title: antarangattilE vandu
sahitya:
antarangattilE vandu vandinittiDum AtmArAmanai ninaivAi manamE


anupallavi

  vindai vindaiyAna tantira vEDam En viruppu veruppillA vimala veLiyAna


caraNam    pon sheyum vAdamum puttaka vAdamum poruL ariyArada verum polip-piDivAdamum
annattirkkE pODum araharA nAdamum anju bhUtam sirikkum panjai vinOdamE
aghandai mamataiyinri ughanduL aDakki ninru sakham tarum taLaiyinri sukham tarum tavamonri
